input.sentences: this is our first trip to a castle n location
i could n't believe i was here .
then we went inside . the halls were so tall .
finally we went to the throne room . it was amazing
output.sentences: Nancy and Gail had taken many trips together, but this was their first to England.
What they most wanted to see was a castle.
They paid their admission and stared in awe at the size of the tower.
Their voices echoed in the huge hall.
The highlight of the visit to the castle was to sit upon the throne of the king.
